attributes.action: Stop allowing MPs to get rich at the tax payers expense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that many politicians have been and are exploiting the expense system to their own financial benefit. it is not enough to say it was within the rules where claims are clearly morally wrong. If they cannot exercise the appropriate judgement they shouldn't be in Parliament. This petition is for all those who believe that this makes those people UNFIT for public office and that they should be excluded from the country's law making AND tax raising institutions regardless of their political affiliation or position.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
